byline.contributor: Dan Levin contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Iran never said why it was holding the professor, but her release coincided with an announcement that Canada and Iran would discuss reopening embassies.
snippet: Iran never said why it was holding the professor, but her release coincided with an announcement that Canada and Iran would discuss reopening embassies....

headline.main: Iran Releases Homa Hoodfar, a Canadian-Iranian Professor Held Since June
